Keyboard shortcuts for Skype

A visual cheat-sheet for the 31 keyboard shortcuts found in Skype

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Open Notification panel

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • O

Open app settings

  • Ctrl
  • ,

Launch main dial pad

  • Ctrl
  • 2

Start new conversation

  • Ctrl
  • N

New group

  • Ctrl
  • G

Find in current conversation

  • Ctrl
  • F

Select next message in search results

  • Shift
  • Enter

Select previous message in search results

  • Enter

Focus Message Composer

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • E

Search for People, Groups, and Messages

  • Ctrl
  • Option
  • S

Navigate to recent chats

  • Alt
  • 1

Open contacts

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • C

Open contact screen to bots

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • B

Send feedback

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • O

Refresh the app

  • Ctrl
  • R

Open themes

  • Ctrl
  • T

Toggle between light and dark mode

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • T

Zoom in, out, or actual size

  • Ctrl
  • +/-/0

Edit the last message sent

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • E

Show conversation profile

  • Ctrl
  • I

Add people to conversation or call

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • A

Hide conversation

  • Ctrl
  • E

Mark as unread

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • U

Start video call or toggle video on/off

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • K

Select multiple messages in conversation

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • L

Start or answer audio call

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • R

Send a file

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • F

Open gallery

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • G

Take a snapshot

  • Ctrl
  • S

Hang up

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • H

Toggle mute

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • M
